courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you a content creator, entrepreneur, or freelancer who wants to work smarter—not harder? Do you feel overwhelmed by content creation, editing, planning, and design? Discover how to save time, boost productivity, and enhance creativity using the power of AI tools—no coding or tech skills required.

In this hands-on course, you’ll learn how to leverage AI-powered tools to streamline your workflow, generate content faster, and produce professional-quality work effortlessly. Whether you're a non-tech creator, digital marketer, coach, or small business owner, this course is your shortcut to modern, smart, and automated content creation.

From AI writing assistants like ChatGPT and Jasper to design platforms like Canva AI and Adobe Firefly, we’ll explore the most powerful and user-friendly tools available today. You’ll also dive into AI video tools like Descript and Pictory, and learn how to automate repetitive tasks using platforms like Zapier—all without writing a single line of code.

What You'll Learn:

  • How to use AI tools for content creation (writing, design, video, and planning)

  • Craft high-converting blog posts, emails, and social content with AI writing tools

  • Design stunning visuals with AI design platforms—no graphic design experience needed

  • Create videos with voiceovers using AI video editors and AI voice tools

  • Organize, research, and plan with Notion AI, ClickUp AI, and more

  • Automate workflows with no-code AI automation tools like Zapier

  • Save hours of manual work and increase your creative output

This Course Is Perfect For:

  • Freelancers and solopreneurs aiming to increase productivity

  • Digital marketers and social media managers

  • Bloggers, YouTubers, podcasters, and online educators

  • Small business owners wanting to simplify and scale content

Why Take This Course?

AI is changing the game—and those who understand how to use it have a massive edge. This course gives you practical, step-by-step guidance so you can start implementing AI into your workflow immediately, even if you're a complete beginner.

By the end of this course, you’ll have the tools, templates, and confidence to use AI for content creation, automation, and smart marketing strategies—no tech skills required.

courseDetails.title: [NEW] AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner 2025 [CLF-C02]
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build strong AWS foundation | Become AWS Cloud Certified | 40+ Labs | 1 Full Practic Test | For absolute AWS beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
[Last Updated - 16-Oct-2025]


This isn't just another AWS course.

I strongly believe that "A strong technical foundation is the key to a successful AWS career and you must build it once and build it right "

With this belief, I have built this course from the ground up, drawing from a decade of AWS expertise and 20 years in IT and 7 years working at AWS.  So try to get most out of this course. All the best !

~Chetan


About this course:

  • This is not just any other AWS Certification course, this course provides everything you need to know as a techie.

  • We are going to cover even the most basics such as What is VM? What is container? How HTTPS work? How DNS works?  What is object storage? What is Generative AI? and many more such topics. Hence look this as a comprehensive course beyond the AWS.

  • This course provides you everything to pass your AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam (CLF-C02)

  • This course provides the hands-on experience to get started with AWS.

  • No prior IT or Cloud experience required. This course can be taken by absolutely beginners.


Course topics:

  • AWS Cloud - A big picture

  • Cloud Concepts

  • AWS Global Infrastructure - Regions, AZ, Edge locations, Local Zones, Wavelegth zones

  • AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM)

  • Amazon EC2

  • Containers on AWS - ECS, EKS

  • AWS Serverless - AWS Lambda & Fargate

  • Load Balancing and Autoscaling - Application Load Balancer (ALB) and Autoscaling Group (ASG)

  • DNS and Edge Networking - Route53, Amazon CloudFront, Global Accelerator

  • Storage Services - Amazon S3, Elastic Block Storage (EBS), EFS/FSx

  • Databases in AWS - RDS, DynamoDB, DocumentDB, Neptune etc.

  • Big data and Analytics in AWS - Amazon Glue, EMR, Athena, Redshift

  • Networking in AWS - Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), VPN, DirectConnect

  • Application Integration services - API gateway, AppSync, SNS, SQS, MQ

  • Infrastructure deployment - Amazon CloudFormation, CDK

  • DevOps in AWS - CodeBuild, CodeDeploy, CodePipeline, ElasticBeanstalk

  • Infrastructure Management - AWS Systems Manager, AWS Config

  • Monitoring & Logging - Amazon CloudWatch, Amazon CloudTrail, X-Ray

  • Machine learning in AWS - Amazon SageMaker, AI Services (Rekognition, Transcribe, Polly, Translate etc.)

  • Generative AI in AWS - Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Q

  • Security in AWS - AWS KMS, WAF, Shield, Secrets Manager, Inspector etc.

  • AWS Account Management - AWS Organization, AWS Control Tower, RAM

  • AWS Billing - AWS Calculator, AWS Cost Explorer

  • AWS Support

  • AWS Well-Architected Framework and AWS Cloud Adoption Framework

  • AWS Shared responsibility model

  • Additional AWS Services - AWS IoT, Migration services, License manager etc.

  • Exam prepartion tips

  • Full Practice Test (65 questions)

Pre-requistes:

  • You will need an AWS account for performing all the labs. Instructions for creating an AWS account and configuring it are provided in the Course pre-requisite section.
targetAudiences: This course is designed for anyone who wants to learn AWS from stratch and earn their AWS Cloud Practitioner certificate
